name: Recommendo
description: Recommendo is a recommendation platform where users can submit their queries for product recommendations and provide suggestions to others.

name: EquiSports
description: The Sports Equipment Online Store is a responsive e-commerce website designed to provide users with a platform to browse, purchase, and review various sports accessories, ranging from gear to apparel, catering to different sports disciplines. This project focuses on creating a dynamic, user-friendly shopping experience with full authentication and product management features.

name: Peddy
description: Peddy is a platform dedicated to helping families find their perfect pet companion. It simplifies the adoption process by connecting users with a variety of pets, including puppies, kittens, and adult animals in need of loving homes. The site offers an easy way to browse and adopt, ensuring a heartwarming experience for both the pet and the adopter.

name: Coffee Club
description: The 'Coffee Club' website offers a cozy, welcoming platform dedicated to coffee enthusiasts. It provides a space to explore various types of coffee, interact with other coffee lovers, and discover coffee-related content. The design is sleek, user-friendly, and includes engaging visuals that celebrate coffee culture. Visitors can enjoy browsing through different coffee blends, articles, and join the coffee community for an immersive experience.
